bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

div1.p: To J. RICHARD LANE Dr. 644 CENTRAL BUILDING
For meals furnished at U.S. Immigration Station, Seattle, during the month of September and October, 1913 to Hindus ex. S.S. "Minnesota"

From To Meals Nur Kahn Sept.27 before B Oct. 8 after D 35 Yeshar Singh " 8 after D 35 Tallock Singh " 8 after D 35 Bejin Singh " 8 after D 35 Mullah Singh " 8 after D 35 Kissin Singh " 8 after D 35 Gurwkh Singh " 8 after D 35 Gurdit Singh " 8 after D 35 Bah Singh " 8 after D 35 Naram Singh " 8 after D 35 Kishin Singh " 9 after D 38 Bishan Singh " 7 after D 32 Dipip Singh " 8 after D 35 Kaku Singh " 2 after S 18 Alla Singh " 7 after D 32 Sanda Kahn " 2 after S 18 Mandar Kahn " 16 after S 60 Mohamed Alam " 16 after S 60 Goita Singh " 8 after D 35 Gulan Mohamed " 3 after S 21 Sajwar Kahn " 2 after S 18 Gol Ahmad " 16 after S 60 Umar Din " 16 after S 60 Mur Abdullah " 6 after S 30 Purum Singh " 8 after D 35 Chrag Din " 16 after s 60 Hawast " 6 after S 30 Takam Singh " 8 after D 35 Santa Singh " 8 after D 35 Bishan Singh " 8 after D 35 Abas Ally " 7 after S 33 Bhagwan Singh " 8 after D 35 Rulia Singh " 9 after D 38 Ambran Singh " 8 after D 35 Ali But " 8 after D 35 Kazan Singh " 2 after D 18 Hira Singh " 8 after D 35 Sham Singh " 2 after D 17 Bei Singh " 8 after D 35 Milkha Singh " 1 after S 15 Rehmat du Khan " 16 after D 60 Bagoo Kahn " 7 after D 32 Babu Singh " 8 after D 35 Sultan Ali " 2 after D 17 Bahadur Sah " 16 after S 60 Bag Alli " 16 after S 60 Prem Singh " 8 after D 35 Cher Singh " 8 after D 35 Karam Kahn " 6 after S 60 Kahrim Dad " 8 after D 35 Anamant Khan " 8 after D 35 SSanobar Khan " 16 after S 60 Forwarded /1947
To J. RICHARD LANE Dr. 644 CENTRAL BUILDING
For meals furnished at U.S. Immigration Station, Seattle, during the month of

From To Meals Brought forward, 1947 Haya Kahn Sept.27 before B Oct.16 after S 60 Amir Kahn " 16 after S 60 Yse Kahn " 2 after S 18 Lana Singh " 8 after D 35 Prem Singh " 8 after D 35 Ismail " 8 after D 35 Mada " 7 after D 32 Santhay Khan " 3 after S 21 Basal Singh " 8 after D 35 Dilip Singh " 1 after D 14 Niaz Mohamed " 2 after S 18 Noring Singh " 8 after D 35 Arjan Singh " 8 after D 35 Munshi Singh " 8 after D 35 Ram Singh " 8 after D 35 Mathai Kanor " 8 after D 35 Mokand Singh " 6 after S 30 Ebriam Khan " 2 after S 18 Briam Singh " 8 after D 35 Pagar Singh " 8 after D 35 /2603

These Hindus are still at U.S. Immigration Station and their board will be billed against you when they have been disposed of. The next bill will be remedered from October 16th after Supper until time out. J.R.L.
